thread.section_title: Extra Space Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Extra Space Storage | www.extraspace.com | 4 of 73
thread.title: R. S.
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by R. S.

author: R. S.
title: R. S.
text:
I have had my items in storage at the same facility for many years, thru
all the changes in Business names! Most recently when Extra Space Storage became my newest landlord of my items, I feared I would lose the great rapport and customer service I received over the years. To my surprise, the Manager, and Co-Managers were exceptionally accommodating to me, and surprisingly Very Friendly and Helpful. They helped me to even downsize my space after I began selling off my personal items kept in storage all these years! As I unclutter the last remnants of my items, I am thankful for the Great Staff I have just begun to get to know in my journey. This is a Very Good Place to Store your items, and has the nicest, and very helpful staff employed there!
